sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update metric attributes 'max_active_ose_per_server'/'max_install_per_ose' to unlimited for window server datacenter edition. Metric attributes will be unlimited for Per core with CAL and Per Processor.</description>
        <name>Update Windows Server Datacenter metric </name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateMetricAttributes() {
	var MICROSOFT_WINDOW_SERVER_PRODUCT_SYS_ID = 'ac3010460b3022002d6c650d37673a24';
	var PER_CORE_WITH_CAL_FOR_MICROSOFT_ID = '22796ca493322200f2ef14f1b47ffb28';
	var PER_PROCESSOR_FOR_MICROSOFT_ID = '4c2701d693872200f2ef14f1b47ffb72';
	var MAX_ACTIVE_OSE_PER_SERVER = 'max_active_ose_per_server';
	var MAX_INSTALL_PER_OSE = 'max_install_per_ose';
	var metricGr = new GlideRecord('samp_sw_metric_attribute');
	metricGr.addQuery('software_model.product', MICROSOFT_WINDOW_SERVER_PRODUCT_SYS_ID);
	metricGr.addQuery('software_model.edition', 'CONTAINS', 'datacenter');
	metricGr.addQuery('license_metric', [PER_CORE_WITH_CAL_FOR_MICROSOFT_ID, PER_PROCESSOR_FOR_MICROSOFT_ID]);
	metricGr.addQuery('attribute', [MAX_ACTIVE_OSE_PER_SERVER, MAX_INSTALL_PER_OSE]);
	metricGr.setValue('attribute_value_is_unlimited', true);
	metricGr.setValue('attribute_value', '');
	metricGr.updateMultiple();
}

updateMetricAttributes();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-03-28 20:34:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4bb5cb1053a033008ab0ddeeff7b12ca</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update Windows Server Datacenter metric </sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4bb5cb1053a033008ab0ddeeff7b12ca</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-12-23 06:15:05</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
